title: Brigand

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Ransom the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the day, everyone learns of the Ransomed player.
- If no player is hanged, the Ransomed player is hanged instead.
- If a good player is hanged, the Ransomed player is also hanged if they are of the same faction and subalignment as the player who died.
- You start the game knowing one random player from each present REF.
- __*Made for the Curated role list*__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.
